blogPost.excerpt:
Did Dream Fake His Speedrun - RESPONSE , I'm sure a lot of you have been waiting for this...

This video I go over a recent video made by the Speedrun Mod team that claims that the odds that I got a series of drops over the span of a week is 1 in 7.5 trillion, and therefore came to the conclusion that I must have cheated. This video is meant to refute these claims. I encourage everyone to watch until the end, especially if they watched the original video.

In this video we hear from a statistical expert with a PhD that wrote a 19 page analysis on what the mods did wrong. I also disprove some of the claims made in the original video. All relevant information should be viewable below.

Although I would have loved to attempt to refute the math myself, I suck at math and would have looked like a complete idiot. So, that's where an expert comes in.

Expert's Report & Analysis - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1yfLURFdDhMfrvI2cFMdYM8f_M_IRoAlM/view?usp=sharing

World File - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1pfA1HVWkROlFRG4egWh0GYV5SpbJGozR/view?usp=sharing

Tutorial for viewing level.dat, go to https://irath96.github.io/webNBT/ , and upload the "level.dat" file from the folder there. You can see the raw contents on the right, and an easy to use GUI on the left.

Jar File - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1OEuu6PWAbhYo3BlUT2hL8mM_aiVPa9Yu/view?usp=sharing
This can be decompiled using a "Java Decompiler", but the modified dates can be verified on your computer.

Thank you to Willz for giving a statement in this video.

All revenue made from this video is being donated to the Minecraft Java Edition Speedrun Mod Team in order to fund development of an anti-cheater speedrun client.

Generally, speedrunning is a past time of mine and is a lot of fun. I mostly look forward to the funny moments with my friends, and the challenge that it presents for me.

Music From:
Audioblocks,
Lemmino - Cipher: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b0q5PR1xpA0
Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio
blogPost.body:
Did Dream Fake His Speedrun - RESPONSE , I'm sure a lot of you have been waiting for this...

This video I go over a recent video made by the Speedrun Mod team that claims that the odds that I got a series of drops over the span of a week is 1 in 7.5 trillion, and therefore came to the conclusion that I must have cheated. This video is meant to refute these claims. I encourage everyone to watch until the end, especially if they watched the original video.

In this video we hear from a statistical expert with a PhD that wrote a 19 page analysis on what the mods did wrong. I also disprove some of the claims made in the original video. All relevant information should be viewable below.

Although I would have loved to attempt to refute the math myself, I suck at math and would have looked like a complete idiot. So, that's where an expert comes in.

Expert's Report & Analysis - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1yfLURFdDhMfrvI2cFMdYM8f_M_IRoAlM/view?usp=sharing

World File - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1pfA1HVWkROlFRG4egWh0GYV5SpbJGozR/view?usp=sharing

Tutorial for viewing level.dat, go to https://irath96.github.io/webNBT/ , and upload the "level.dat" file from the folder there. You can see the raw contents on the right, and an easy to use GUI on the left.

Jar File - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1OEuu6PWAbhYo3BlUT2hL8mM_aiVPa9Yu/view?usp=sharing
This can be decompiled using a "Java Decompiler", but the modified dates can be verified on your computer.

Thank you to Willz for giving a statement in this video.

All revenue made from this video is being donated to the Minecraft Java Edition Speedrun Mod Team in order to fund development of an anti-cheater speedrun client.

Generally, speedrunning is a past time of mine and is a lot of fun. I mostly look forward to the funny moments with my friends, and the challenge that it presents for me.

Music From:
Audioblocks,
Lemmino - Cipher: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b0q5PR1xpA0
Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio

localize.title: 梦境伪造了他的速跑反应吗
localize.description:
梦境伪造了他的速跑反应，我相信你们很多人都在等这件事……

这个视频我看了一下SpeedRun Mod团队最近制作的一个视频，它声称我在一周内连续下降的几率是7.5万亿分之一，因此得出的结论是我一定是作弊了。这段视频旨在驳斥这些说法。我鼓励每个人都看到最后，特别是如果他们看了原版视频的话。

在这段视频中，我们听到一位拥有博士学位的统计专家写了一份长达19页的分析报告，分析了国防部的错误之处。我还反驳了原始视频中的一些说法。下面应该可以查看所有相关信息。

虽然我自己也很想反驳这个数学，但我的数学很差，看起来就像个彻头彻尾的白痴。所以，这就是专家的用武之地。

专家报告与分析-https://drive.google.com/file/d/1yfLURFdDhMfrvI2cFMdYM8f_M_IRoAlM/view?usp=sharing

世界文件-https://drive.google.com/file/d/1pfA1HVWkROlFRG4egWh0GYV5SpbJGozR/view?usp=sharing

有关查看Leve.dat的教程，请转到https://irath96.github.io/webNBT/，并从那里的文件夹上传“Leve.dat”文件。您可以在右侧看到原始内容，在左侧看到易于使用的GUI。

JAR文件-https://drive.google.com/file/d/1OEuu6PWAbhYo3BlUT2hL8mM_aiVPa9Yu/view?usp=sharing
这可以使用“Java反编译器”进行反编译，但是修改后的日期可以在您的计算机上进行验证。

感谢Willz在这段视频中发表的声明。

所有从这段视频中获得的收入都将捐赠给“我的世界”Java版Speedrun Mod团队，以资助一个反作弊的Speedrun客户端的开发。

一般说来，速跑是我的过往时间，很有趣。我最期待的是和我的朋友们一起度过的有趣时刻，以及它给我带来的挑战。

音乐来源：
奥迪布洛克，
莱米诺密码：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b0q5PR1xpA0
卡尔·凯西@白蝙蝠音频

localize.title: 夢境僞造了他的速跑反應嗎
localize.description:
夢境僞造了他的速跑反應，我相信你們很多人都在等這件事……

這個視頻我看了一下SpeedRun Mod團隊最近製作的一個視頻，它聲稱我在一週內連續下降的機率是7.5萬億分之一，因此得出的結論是我一定是作弊了。這段視頻旨在駁斥這些說法。我鼓勵每個人都看到最後，特別是如果他們看了原版視頻的話。

在這段視頻中，我們聽到一位擁有博士學位的統計專家寫了一份長達19頁的分析報告，分析了國防部的錯誤之處。我還反駁了原始視頻中的一些說法。下面應該可以查看所有相關信息。

雖然我自己也很想反駁這個數學，但我的數學很差，看起來就像個徹頭徹尾的白癡。所以，這就是專家的用武之地。

專家報告與分析-https://drive.google.com/file/d/1yfLURFdDhMfrvI2cFMdYM8f_M_IRoAlM/view?usp=sharing

世界文件-https://drive.google.com/file/d/1pfA1HVWkROlFRG4egWh0GYV5SpbJGozR/view?usp=sharing

有關查看Leve.dat的教程，請轉到https://irath96.github.io/webNBT/，並從那裏的文件夾上傳“Leve.dat”文件。您可以在右側看到原始內容，在左側看到易於使用的GUI。

JAR文件-https://drive.google.com/file/d/1OEuu6PWAbhYo3BlUT2hL8mM_aiVPa9Yu/view?usp=sharing
這可以使用“Java反編譯器”進行反編譯，但是修改後的日期可以在您的計算機上進行驗證。

感謝Willz在這段視頻中發表的聲明。

所有從這段視頻中獲得的收入都將捐贈給“我的世界”Java版Speedrun Mod團隊，以資助一個反作弊的Speedrun客戶端的開發。

一般說來，速跑是我的過往時間，很有趣。我最期待的是和我的朋友們一起度過的有趣時刻，以及它給我帶來的挑戰。

音樂來源：
奧迪布洛克，
萊米諾密碼：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b0q5PR1xpA0
卡爾·凱西@白蝙蝠音頻

next.excerpt:
As of just after 7 a.m. Thursday morning, the lava lake surface is was 1,483 feet below the crater rim observation site, indicating that the lake is 554 feet deep. Scientists estimate the lake rose 39 feet in just under 24 hours. 

A synthesized voice was utilized in the narration for this story. Video and photos are from the USGS Hawaiian Volcano Observatory.

Air quality at HVNP: https://www.hawaiiso2network.com/
next.title: Kilauea Eruption Day Four - Rising Lava Lake Update (Dec. 24, 2020)

localize.title: 基拉韦厄火山喷发第四天-上升的熔岩湖更新(2020年12月24日)
localize.description:
截至上午7点刚过周四上午，熔岩湖表面位于火山口边缘观测点下方1483英尺，表明该湖有554英尺深。科学家估计，这个湖在不到24小时的时间里上升了39英尺。

这个故事的叙述采用了合成的声音。视频和照片来自美国地质勘探局夏威夷火山天文台。

香港天文台的空气质素：https://www.hawaiiso2network.com/

localize.title: 基拉韋厄火山噴發第四天-上升的熔岩湖更新(2020年12月24日)
localize.description:
截至上午7點剛過週四上午，熔岩湖表面位於火山口邊緣觀測點下方1483英尺，表明該湖有554英尺深。科學家估計，這個湖在不到24小時的時間裏上升了39英尺。

這個故事的敘述採用了合成的聲音。視頻和照片來自美國地質勘探局夏威夷火山天文臺。

香港天文臺的空氣質素：https://www.hawaiiso2network.com/
